Benchmark.title: All SCE community content checks
Benchmark.description: This checklist contains all checks of all XCCDFs available as part of the SCE community content.
Benchmark.notice: This XCCDF has been automatically generated, it should only serve as a baseline!

front-matter.html:p: SCE community content is intended to be used to discover issues in GNU/Linux systems. Parts could even be used to check non-Linux systems but that is not officially supported.
One of the use cases is distribution QA: discovering issues with stock configurations of distributions.
